markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _spellstriker staff_ is wrought iron with gleaming arcane sigils etched into its surface and a sharp point at the bottom. Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shifting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=302) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. **Craft Requirements** You have the [magus's](/Classes.aspx?ID=17) Spellstrike activity. Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Spellstriker Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 360 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236)
  • **1st** [_echoing weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=899), [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
  • **2nd** [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [_telekinetic maneuver_](/Spells.aspx?ID=333)
Spellstriker Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 1,400 gp **Bulk** 1 --- Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+2 striking shifting staff_.
  • **3rd** _echoing weapon_, [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147)
  • **4th** _acid arrow_, [_weapon storm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=373)
Spellstriker Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 8,500 gp **Bulk** 1 --- Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+2 greater striking shifting staff_.
  • **5th** [_blink charge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=872), _echoing weapon_, [_vampiric touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
  • **6th** _acid arrow_, _weapon storm_
  • **7th** _blink charge_, [_true target_](/Spells.aspx?ID=346)
name: Spellstriker Staff
